title: The Internet
description: The Internet has revolutionized the way the world operates. From online shopping to instantaneous communication, the Internet has changed the way we access knowledge and exchange information. The Internet introduces students to the history of the Internet, explores the way it has evolved over time, and asks students to contemplate its many effects on the world. The book can also be used to teach students how to discern the author's point of view and to effectively summarize.
meta: bandwidth, bit, broadband, browser, client, domain names, fiber-optic, Internet, Internet Service Provider (ISP), modem, search engine, server, URL, WiFi
Author's Point of View : Determine the author’s point of view
Irregular Verbs : Identify and use irregular verbs

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
